item.title: Linux Boot Process: Complete Guide from Power Button to Login
item.description: To be a solid systems engineer, you need to deeply understand the Linux boot process. Only by knowing “what normal looks like” can you quickly troubleshoot when things go wrong. This post walks through every stage from power button to login screen.
